statements: SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT whistleblower_name FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE whistleblower_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT complaint_text, whistleblower_name FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Closed';
SELECT complaint_text, whistleblower_name, complaint_date FROM whistleblower_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE whistleblower_name LIKE '%John%' AND investigation_status = 'Open';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT DISTINCT whistleblower_name FROM whistleblower_complaints ORDER BY whistleblower_name ASC;
SELECT complaint_id, whistleblower_name, complaint_date FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE investigation_status = 'Closed';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT response_text, response_date FROM complaint_response ORDER BY response_date DESC;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_text FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 3;
SELECT complaint_date, complaint_id FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complainant_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complainant_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT cc.complainant_name, cr.response_text FROM whistleblower_complaints cc JOIN complaint_response cr ON cc.complaint_id = cr.complaint_id;

SELECT cc.complainant_name, COUNT(cr.response_id) AS responses_count FROM whistleblower_complaints cc LEFT JOIN complaint_response cr ON cc.complaint_id = cr.complaint_id GROUP BY cc.complainant_name HAVING responses_count > 1;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name FROM whistleblower_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, report_description, reported_date FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE reported_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, complaint_description FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complainant_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT action_id, report_id, action_date, action_taken FROM whistleblower_actions ORDER BY action_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_date, complaint_description FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complainant_name LIKE 'John%' OR complainant_name LIKE 'Mary%' ORDER BY complainant_name ASC;

SELECT complaint_id, complainant_name, report_description FROM whistleblower_complaints JOIN whistleblower_reports ON whistleblower_complaints.complaint_id = whistleblower_reports.complaint_id WHERE report_description LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY complaint_id ASC;

SELECT report_id, complaint_id, reported_date, action_taken FROM whistleblower_reports JOIN whistleblower_actions ON whistleblower_reports.report_id = whistleblower_actions.report_id WHERE reported_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY reported_date DESC;
SELECT complainant_name, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM whistleblower_complaints GROUP BY complainant_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_complaints DESC;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT complaint_description, complaint_date FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT investigator_name, years_of_experience FROM investigators ORDER BY years_of_experience DESC;
SELECT complaint_date, complaint_description FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 105;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 2;
SELECT investigator_name, department, years_of_experience FROM investigators WHERE investigator_id = 3;
SELECT complaint_description FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM investigations WHERE investigation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_details FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date = '2022-07-15';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_allegations ORDER BY allegation_type DESC;
SELECT investigator_name, investigation_status FROM whistleblower_investigations WHERE complaint_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-06-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_complaints;
SELECT complainant_name, complaint_details FROM whistleblower_complaints WHERE complaint_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT whistleblower_complaints.complainant_name, whistleblower_allegations.allegation_description FROM whistleblower_complaints INNER JOIN whistleblower_allegations ON whistleblower_complaints.id = whistleblower_allegations.complaint_id WHERE whistleblower_allegations.allegation_type = 'Fraud';

SELECT whistleblower_investigations.investigator_name, whistleblower_reports.report_details FROM whistleblower_investigations INNER JOIN whistleblower_reports ON whistleblower_investigations.id = whistleblower_reports.investigation_id WHERE whistleblower_investigations.investigation_status = 'Open';
SELECT * FROM whistleblower_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 3;
